name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"222152e6-50c9-4fa6-8c9c-76255769c7fb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: visit_For","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d7577649-b6ff-4a2d-9777-200b2ee23385","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_For","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function handles Python ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"for","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" loops. Its primary responsibility is to analyze the loop mechanics: identifying the iterator (the list or object being looped over), resolving the iteration protocol (finding ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__iter__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__next__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), and crucially, determining what values are assigned to the loop variable (the target) for use inside the loop body.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1a4025e7-0270-4e54-b5b8-c11bd3d26fda","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"In static analysis, loops introduce variable assignments that happen implicitly. In the statement ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"for user in users:","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", there is no explicit assignment operator (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"=","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). However, inside the loop, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has a specific type and value derived from the contents of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"users","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Without this function, the analyzer wouldn't know that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" refers to a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object, leading to "undefined attribute" errors if the code later calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cb114bc8-b467-44f6-820f-fbf76627a636","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ddc7137b-08e4-4a4f-a59a-577d69a96c29","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Target Initialization:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"a8f53781-05b9-4b17-9e29-daacd70adb24","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It visits the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.target","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (e.g., the variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"i","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or tuple ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"x, y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d17a9f22-a980-4040-aee1-0410920b57a0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It ensures definitions exist for these loop variables in the current scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"835fc8e7-4051-4d56-94bc-10ca7c4f0b92","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterator Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"b975fdb7-bc92-44cc-9af5-00a49e7bddab","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It identifies the object being iterated over (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"node.iter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), such as a list variable or a function call returning a generator.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"352a6c2d-03d7-4636-8551-a3a9af61d752","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to find the definition of this iterable.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"96ca0317-745c-4a06-b39a-5b3c34343fc4","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Protocol Simulation:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"34386e16-5969-42a9-892e-16d253e39975","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function attempts to simulate Python's iteration protocol. For the resolved iterable object, it looks for standard methods: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__iter__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__next__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dda2beda-acb4-4f68-a62c-0b860fcf9140","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It also checks the return values of these methods (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ITER_METHOD.RETURN_NAME","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NEXT_METHOD.RETURN_NAME","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2c8721ab-96c4-4bf1-8149-1209c2e9a403","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It temporarily "pushes" these methods onto the stack to acknowledge that iterating implicitly calls them.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"7410ac7d-7950-4cc1-accb-ad64efd94d3a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Value Propagation:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"f1c7ffa9-1414-47a5-8934-649118f21ba5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It collects all potential return values found from the iteration methods (the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pointList","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6aba197b-cf80-425d-806c-1dd82099338c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It assigns these values to the loop target variable (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"inode","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"502ef366-633f-42d7-af12-c876db2502eb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This effectively tells the analyzer: "Variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"i","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" gets its value from the return type of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iterable.__next__()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"656406ee-f91e-47e8-ab47-48ba01116f45","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Code:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1facbd02-e624-4d35-a731-914d939d09a0","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"names = ["Alice", "Bob"]
for n in names:
    print(n)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"445a11f3-d7d9-4d1a-896e-c1d9b3d28e54","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Analysis:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae9a930b-9557-49c0-92c8-c0562c478c2e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"visit_For","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" looks at ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"names","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4fcf7257-8267-40cd-87cc-3eb2cb756a5b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It resolves ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"names","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to a List Definition containing Strings.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5f2593f8-04b4-4e28-8835-b0a6b1577796","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It looks for the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__iter__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__next__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" behavior of the List type.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c92daa24-a142-4acf-8808-ad8c07cb477c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It determines that iterating a List of Strings yields a String.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ca4bddcc-5e8b-4fd5-b991-eae94eebc99a","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It updates the definition of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"n","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the current scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5c8fcd64-2143-49db-a348-6604397e6b40","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Inside the loop, the analyzer now recognizes that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"n","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a String.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5567dfd-be04-471c-b5a1-b8e9862f9c81","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
